Name: MySQL - Add Database User To Role
Description: Adds a database user to a role
Author: twerthi

Parameters.Name: addMySQLServerName
Parameters.Label: MySQL Server name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the MySQL database server

Parameters.Name: addLoginWithAddRoleRights
Parameters.Label: Login name
Parameters.HelpText: Login name of a user that can add roles to other users.

Parameters.Name: addUsername
Parameters.Label: User name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the user to add the role to.

Parameters.Name: addRoleName
Parameters.Label: Role name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the role to add to the user.

Parameters.Name: addUseSSL
Parameters.Label: Use SSL
Parameters.HelpText: Check this box to force the use of SSL.
